Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
Game allows users to play a game of UNO Flip
Author:
Angus Jull

  • Method Details

    • playGame

      public void playGame()
      Plays a game of UNO Flip

    • nextPlayer

      private Player nextPlayer(Player player)
      Returns the next player to play in the game
      Parameters:
      player - The player who's turn it currently is
      Returns:
      The next player who's turn it is, or the current player if nobody is next

    • configurePlayers

      private boolean configurePlayers()
      Uses the console to add new players to the game
      Returns:
      True if players have been added, false otherwise

    • drawHands

      private void drawHands()
      Makes the players each draw a hand from the current deck

    • getPoints

      private int getPoints()
      Calculates the points the current player gets from winning the round
      Returns:
      the total points of all players hand EXCEPT the winning players

    • processChoice

      private void processChoice(Card choice)
      Decide what to do based on the card played. Can change the current player and the top card
      Parameters:
      choice - The card that was played on the currentPlayer's turn

    • handleWild

      private Card handleWild(Card wild)
      Handle the user input for playing a wild card, in choosing a colour and setting that colour
      Returns:
      A card with the chosen colour, or the top card if the top card is not a wild card.

    • printRoundInfo

      private void printRoundInfo()
      Print out information for the current Player

    • getPlayerInput

      private int getPlayerInput()
      Play a card from the current players hand, make a play depending on the input provided by a human player, continues asking for input until an integer is provided
      Returns:
      A number representing the player's choice of what to do

      private Card playCard()
      Gets the current player to play a card, and then returns the card they play

    • main
